title: Real-World Task-Based MOOC Participation Enhancement and Reward System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Strengthens real-world problem-solving skills via task designs optimized for smartphone-based learning and small-group collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can identify and complete three or more real-life tasks linked to MOOC platforms
Learners can propose ways to apply skills acquired through project-based assessments to real-world work environments.
Learners can develop strategies to sustain learning motivation by utilizing a digital reward system.

resources: Basic digital tools for task performance (document editors, survey platforms, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
